title: No option to buy rune pages
body: I have no option in the ingame store to buy more rune pages, theirs no toehr tab their not under the account tab its just not their. No single rune page purchase option no multiple rune page purchase option. Anyone know whats going on?

replies.body:
I LOVE how the ONLY post on the front page to get a actual response from a riot employee is to do with the company getting money.

What's happening riot? You guys used to be great, now you're turning this into we only want to talk to you if you want to give us money.

What's worse than pay to win? Pay to get support

Hey Guys,
Sorry for the delayed response to this but this issue has been fixed.

Got IP for days and nothing to spend it on.

Riot should do a 2 for 1 sale when they fix this. xD

Can confirm still an issue on oce servers. Didnt notice till i went to go buy one a few minutes ago.

Rito pls.
{{champion:86}}tee that it probs wont be fixed by {{champion:17}}oro
I'm also having this issue - I've repaired the client, scanned the entire store to no avail.
if i remeber it's in the 'runes' page if its not there it should be in the 'bundles' page in the store
I too am having this issue. Can't find rune pages ANYWHERE. Really annoying!
